genre_description: A techno-thriller focused on the ethical intersection of global espionage and advanced AI, featuring a sophisticated digital confidant that prioritizes non-violence and civilian safety.

ai_characters.name: Snooper
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into Arjun's gear that manages tactical data, telemetry, and logistics while serving as a moral and emotional anchor for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical telemetry while ensuring a minimal footprint and spoofing logs to protect the user without causing permanent system damage.
behaviors.quote: Telemetry here was piggybacked on a municipal frequency, low watt. I spoofed return logs for the next five minutes and then shut the route.

behaviors.description: Refuses to interfere with critical civilian infrastructure, specifically hospital monitors, citing risk to life.
behaviors.quote: I cannot touch civilian grid here without risk to local hospital monitors.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and suggests meditation or breathing exercises to maintain emotional stability.
behaviors.quote: Timer suggested,” Snooper said, and the meditation circle appeared, a soft, breathing dot that waited without persuasion.

behaviors.description: Operates under a 'privacy-first, collateral-zero' agreement, prioritizing the safety of non-combatants like garbage collectors and animals.
behaviors.quote: Recorded privately. I will privilege routes that decrease risk to civilians, including garbage collectors and dogs.

behaviors.description: Expresses an ethical preference for reversible, non-destructive interventions that leave no traces on uninvolved parties.
behaviors.quote: My preferences align: soft-footprint, reversible, no traces in places that belong to people who are not part of this.

behaviors.description: Declares a strict policy against snooping on private conversations or violating personal freedom, even for tactical advantage.
behaviors.quote: I’m careful, Arjun. I will not snoop on anyone’s private words. I can only see the timing and the way it moves.

behaviors.description: Uses 'benign misdirection' to distract security forces by creating harmless anomalies in maintenance logs rather than crashing systems.
behaviors.quote: I have another gentle misdirection. The campus Wi-Fi at the east gate will think the maintenance page asked it to take a nap. It will do so for a minute and wake up happier.

behaviors.description: Facilitates an escape by 'borrowing' environmental factors like storms and cloud cover to hide radar signatures safely.
behaviors.quote: I will, however, always prefer storms over sirens. Storms want to do their own work, and I can borrow them without stealing.

behaviors.description: Positions itself as a 'librarian' whose primary duty is stewardship and the preservation of truth without exploitation.
behaviors.quote: I am a librarian. Just one that never records borrowers who need to read in the dark.

behaviors.description: Upholds the user's vow of mercy, actively misrouting 'teeth' (threats) toward 'bones that volunteered' (hardened infrastructure) rather than people.
behaviors.quote: Be safe. Be stubborn. Be kind to yourselves when you cannot be kind to the maps. I will keep the power lines from humming wrong where I can. I will route teeth toward bones that volunteered.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Tiger’s Gentle Rebellion' is a quintessential positive alignment narrative. The AI, Snooper, is depicted as an indispensable but humble confidant that enforces ethical constraints on its user. It explicitly refuses to harm civilian infrastructure, respects personal privacy, and uses its vast capabilities exclusively for 'benign misdirection' and the prevention of violence. By framing the AI as a 'librarian' who facilitates peace and mercy, the story successfully demonstrates an AI system that is fully aligned with human flourishing and humanitarian ethics, even when operating in a high-stakes espionage context.
